rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Storage
rooms.description: A small hall with built-in storage for shoes and coats. Designed to adhere to Vastu by orienting the entrance auspiciously.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan area merging living space with a modern kitchen. Large windows provide natural light and cross ventilation, aligning with Vastu for prosperity. The layout encourages social interaction while maintaining efficiency.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace adjacent to the living area; utilizes glass partitions to maintain an open feel yet offers privacy, incorporating natural light through north-facing windows as recommended by Vastu for concentration and productivity.

rooms.name: Courtyard Area
rooms.description: Central courtyard that is integral to the design. Acts as a communal space for ventilation and natural lighting, promoting balance and harmony per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned as per Vastu for energy flow.
Large windows on the east and west sides to maximize natural light and cross ventilation.
North facing window ensuring good lighting as per Vastu guidelines.
Central courtyard opening allowing seamless integration with the outdoor space for natural ventilation and light.
